Welcome to Calculator1pt1
 Developer: Apoorv Patwardhan
 Please find the information below:
 
 This calculator is designed for simple calculations. There are 4 mathematical operators included - +,-,/,* which can be used between any two numbers.
 Additionally, you can use the CLR button to clear the screen and reset the calculator. 
 The SQRT function calculates the square root of a number. In this case, just press
 SQRT button and then press the number. The = button is used to find the result
 of any calculation.
 The WHY? button is perhaps the most interesting one. It will give you different 
 outputs everytime you press it. Check it out in leisure!
